column2: "<%me>! Long time no see!"
"You were always busy, and I was getting my ARKS special permit, so..."
"It might not be worth saying... But, yeah! I'm happy."
"<%me>? Don't tell me that you forgot who I am?"
"I'm Matoi, remember? Ma. To. I. Get it? Remember now?"
"1. Don't worry, Matoi. I haven't forgotten."
"2. You changed your clothes!"
"Fufu, it's been a while since you last said my name."
"Ah, uh-huh. It's to take a breather or to declare my intentions or..."
"I became an ARKS member. I finally got that special permit that I asked Xiao for so long ago!"
"Now I can finally stand beside you and help! I'll work hard from here on out!"

"That's why I called for you today.
Isn't that right, Xiao?"
"He gave me an administrative position within the ARKS!"
"Sorry, but before we get carried away, I'm going to need to give you one last lecture, Matoi."
"Eh? A lecture? ...I don't like lectures."
"Well, you don't have to say it like that. <%me> will be listening in as well."
"Then I'll listen!"
"...You're really simple-minded, aren't you?"
"Well, I said a \"lecture\", but it's not exactly a \"lecture\", per se."
"It's just an explanation of the ARKS current state of affairs."
"Let's omit the elaborate historical details. If you're interested in that, ask me about it separately."
"Okaaaay."
"...That response makes me anxious. Anyway, concerning ARKS:"
"The ARKS organization has managed to break away from Luther's control."
"However, we have also lost the existence known as [Xion]... That was inevitable."
"It's been half a year since we lost Xion. The rebuilding of the ARKS has finally gotten us back on track."
"In the half year since I said \"I'll perform management duties for the future\", things have been very hectic."
"Now everyone behaves as if my being here is natural... like they've gotten used to everything, really."
"...Now that you've mentioned it, things look a bit different."
"Ah, that's all Ulc's work. \"If we're changing up the ARKS, we're starting with appearances!\"', she said."
"\"I changed the Gate Area too!\", she declared triumphantly, and just look around to see the results."
"Next, about the ARKS' enemies... the Darkers' current state."
"Honestly, it's not pretty."
"Destroying [Loser], who had rooted deep inside ARKS, was a significant gain."

"However, the sealed [Elder] has been revived, and [Apprentice] frequently attacks. And what's
more..."
"Both of you, please watch this footage."
"T-that... That planet was so easily crushed..."
"What we just saw was [Double] crushing a planet as if it were a toy. Those were copies of other planets they devoured."
"Unlike [Elder], who only wants a good fight, and [Apprentice], who seems to be searching for something..."
"[Double] delights in pure and simple destruction. They're the last, and the worst, of the Falz. And now, they're on the move."
"...[Double]."
"It seems that [Double] has decided on a new target."
"Planet Harkotan. It's a recently discovered, civilized planet. [Double] is headed there."
"...Then we need to hurry up and go there too!"
"That's right. And this is the last bit. About the ARKS' purpose."
"The ARKS' purpose is..."
"To defeat all the Darkers and Dark Falz in the entire universe, and save everyone."
"...That's the only part I think you remembered, really."
"Ah, <%me>. Good timing."
"...Don't stop keeping an eye on Matoi. Stay with her as much as possible."
"We don't know when that [Persona] from ten years ago will attack. Also..."
"1. ...You don't have to say the rest."
"2. In case of an emergency?"
"Those are encouraging words... but, don't forget, <%me>."
"...Yes. You'll have to deal with it when the need arises. As a person responsible for what you know."
"Ten years ago, she nearly became the [Profound Darkness] itself. That's an irrefutable fact."
"Things look fine now... but they aren't completely certain. For me, you, and her."
"<%me>? What's wrong, let's hurry up and go."
"...<%me>. I leave her to you."
"Sara knows about this. If something happens, she'll let me know immediately."
"...You... you're plotting something aren't you."
"I just hope it's for nothing."
